languages.text: "Я подниму окровавленную голову ложного закона на пику и разрушу иллюзию, что Расколотое Небо еще имеет хоть какую-то власть. После этого прочие отряды гвардейцев присоединятся ко мне, и начнется наше шествие к звездам!"

"I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, the other Guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"
languages.original_text: "Я подниму окровавленную голову ложного закона на пику и разрушу иллюзию, что Расколотое Небо еще имеет хоть какую-то власть. После этого прочие отряды гвардейцев присоединятся ко мне, и начнется наше шествие к звездам!"

traits.locale_text: "I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike, and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left. Then other guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

"I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike, and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left. Then other guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

"I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and shatter the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, other guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

"I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and shatter the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, other guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

"I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, the other Guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

"I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, the other Guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

languages.text: «Clavaré la cabeza ensangrentada de la ley falsa en una estaca y destruiré la ilusión de que el Cielo Desgarrado conserva algún tipo de poder. Después, las demás unidades de la Guardia se unirán a mí ¡y daremos comienzo a nuestra marcha hacia las estrellas!».
languages.original_text: "I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, the other Guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

traits.locale_text: «Clavaré la cabeza ensangrentada de la ley falsa en una estaca y destruiré la ilusión de que el Cielo Desgarrado conserva algún tipo de poder. Después, las demás unidades de la Guardia se unirán a mí ¡y daremos comienzo a nuestra marcha hacia las estrellas!».

languages.text: “我要把虚假律法沾满鲜血的头颅刺穿在木桩上。我要彻底消灭破碎之空的幻象，消灭一切邪恶的力量。在这之后，我会号召帝国卫队的其他成员加入我的队伍，我们会朝着星辰大海进军！”
languages.original_text: "I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, the other Guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

traits.locale_text: “我要把虚假律法沾满鲜血的头颅刺穿在木桩上。我要彻底消灭破碎之空的幻象，消灭一切邪恶的力量。在这之后，我会号召帝国卫队的其他成员加入我的队伍，我们会朝着星辰大海进军！”

languages.text: 「俺は偽物の支配者の頭に釘を打ち込み、割れた空に力が残っているという幻想を破壊するつもりだ。そして、他の護衛部隊が私に加わり、星々への俺たちの行進が始まるだろう！」
languages.original_text: "I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, the other Guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

traits.locale_text: 「俺は偽物の支配者の頭に釘を打ち込み、割れた空に力が残っているという幻想を破壊するつもりだ。そして、他の護衛部隊が私に加わり、星々への俺たちの行進が始まるだろう！」

languages.text: « Je planterai la tête ensanglantée de la fausse loi au bout d'une pique et je briserai cette illusion selon laquelle la Fracture Céleste détient encore quelque pouvoir. Alors, les autres unités de gardes se joindront à moi, et notre marche vers les étoiles commencera ! »
languages.original_text: "I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, the other Guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

traits.locale_text: « Je planterai la tête ensanglantée de la fausse loi au bout d'une pique et je briserai cette illusion selon laquelle la Fracture Céleste détient encore quelque pouvoir. Alors, les autres unités de gardes se joindront à moi, et notre marche vers les étoiles commencera ! »

languages.text: "Sahte yasanın kanlı kafasını kazığa geçirecek ve Çatlak Gök'ün güç sahibi olduğu yanılsamasını ortadan kaldıracağım. Sonra diğer Muhafız birlikleri de bana katılacak ve yıldızlara doğru yürüyüşümüz başlayacak!"
languages.original_text: "I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, the other Guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

traits.locale_text: "Sahte yasanın kanlı kafasını kazığa geçirecek ve Çatlak Gök'ün güç sahibi olduğu yanılsamasını ortadan kaldıracağım. Sonra diğer Muhafız birlikleri de bana katılacak ve yıldızlara doğru yürüyüşümüz başlayacak!"

languages.text: "Ich werde den blutigen Kopf des falschen Gesetzes auf eine Stange spießen und die Illusion zerstören, dass der Gespaltene Himmel auch nur über einen Rest von Macht verfügt. Dann werden sich mir die anderen Gardisten anschließen und unser Marsch zu den Sternen wird beginnen!"
languages.original_text: "I will raise the bloodied head of the false law on a spike and destroy the illusion that the Riven Sky has any power left in it. Then, the other Guard units will join me, and our march toward the stars will begin!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde den blutigen Kopf des falschen Gesetzes auf eine Stange spießen und die Illusion zerstören, dass der Gespaltene Himmel auch nur über einen Rest von Macht verfügt. Dann werden sich mir die anderen Gardisten anschließen und unser Marsch zu den Sternen wird beginnen!"
